name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Sleeps, zcross00, mikeronomicon, Catachresis, antecen, atticusonline, lk, chatterjee, alejandroadam, littlefatdog, Audhumla, tragicone)

name: anomalous3
text: and he always has a lucky

name: mikebox
text: I don't know how anyone could flush a lucky.

name: kelsotimebomb
text: No kidding. Not even the man who gets things done .

name: jaydub
text: I wouldn'ta thought Ray would be firing blanks, but 20 bullet holes would make the place a shambles.

name: overmedicated
text: A comment left by overmedicated was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by BPMead, tttt2, Taidje_Khan)

name: aaron_haynes
text: This is how I plan to quit smoking one day.

name: le_chien_manquee
text: i know this day is coming for me.  and when it finally arrives, i'll be buying this strip and hanging it on my wall in tribute to the thousands who died for the cause of slightly altering the chemical composition of my brain in a way that made me feel an infinitesimal bit better.  for a few minutes.

name: aaron_haynes
text: Damn, that's a good idea. I think I'll do the same.

name: thrasher
text: perhaps also in tribute to the several lads upstairs who died of bullet wounds

name: dovey
text: Ray quite obviously lives on the top floor.

name: woodenteeth
text: "several lads" refers to the possums that lived in the attic

name: tragicone
text: oh yeah! back tracking. feels good man.

name: woodenteeth
text: Back tracking? Are you stalking me through the archives, or commenting on my 7 month late save of someone else's chubbied post? Confusion? Yeah, that's me.

name: tragicone
text: hey, i did it again!

name: zem
text: fart

name: tragicone
text: That is quite obviously Rays three story house.

name: quantumcasaba
text:
Often when I go out for a stress-induced cigarette, I think of this comment. "..an infinitesimal bit better. for a few minutes."

How does this make you feel?

name: tekende
text: It makes me feel bad. I try to avoid thinking about it.

name: puguglypress
text: and provided a psychological crutch

name: tetrisattack
text: You can do it Ray! I believe in you!

name: moraiat
text:
This is such a great strip, I would have expected it to be 4.5 or so.

Ray either talks about it in his blog or in Ray's Place before he does this. He explains the process and reasoning in detail and this comic, while it stands on its own, punctuates his statement. Things like this add a continuity that makes this little world a bit more believable.

name: geysershitdick
text: http://www.achewood.com/raysplace.php?date=05112004

name: odei
text: The 'lucky' cigarette is last, befitting it's title.

name: closefriend
text: Is anyone going to explain where they're getting the word "lucky" to us non-smokers out there?

name: seanbad
text: Often a smoker will flip a cigarette upside-down in the pack, saving it for the post-coital smoke. That cigarette is referred to as "Lucky."

name: teira
text: I was taught it was sort of a choice. Good luck or good fuck. Smoke it first for a good fuck, save it till the end for good luck.

name: dracer2
text: You tap a new pack from the bottom when you first open it. Usually cigarette will pop out a lot higher than the rest. He is then inverted and saved till last as the lucky cigarette.

name: rowboat
text: And once you're down to your "lucky," you will inevitably light the filter end when you are drunk in a dark place. It is totally awesome when this happens. It is lucky.

name: tourach3
text: i don't know whether to chubby or lame this comment, because it has happened to me and it's just about the worst godawful thing that could happen in such a situation, besides maybe getting shot in the dick

name: deusoma
text: Man, I just wanna take a piss without getting shot in the dick!

name: heccibiggs
text:
That has totally happened to me, but it wasn't even a lucky. I just got mixed up. In my defense, it was a menthol so it was hard to tell.

Also I've never heard of this lucky cigarette thing. I'm going to have to start doing it.

name: rowboat
text:
My aim was not exactly to endorse this practice.

And stop smoking menthols. Shit's bad for you.

name: heccibiggs
text: But I love menthols.

name: rowboat
text: But menthols hate you.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Whatever. I know you're secretly on my side because your feelings on both my comments are pro.

(I was going to write "your feelings on both my assets are pro", but that has very very different connotations.)

name: tekende
text: Menthols are terrible. Like inhaling a burned-down peppermint factory.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Disagreement box.

Also, update box. I did the whole lucky cigarette thing and all that happened was that it lost a whole bunch of tobacco from the end which went all over everything in my bag. So really not all that lucky, I'd say.

name: odei
text: How do you lose tobacco from pre-rolled cigarettes? They're packed tight as hell! Never buy tobacco and papers, unless you want to be covered in it.

name: mangtastic
text:
Rolling your own cigs is heck of cheaper than buying pre-rolled packs.

Also if you invest in a cigarette rolling machine, you don't get it "all over you". Plus the money you save on cartons pays for it eventually.

name: laserblade
text: Or an envelope folding machine, if you're creative.

name: odei
text: I don't know why I posted those words because I strongly feel that buying tobacco and papers provides far more reward than smoking straights.

name: heccibiggs
text:
Hey odei, I got here twelve minutes after you posted your comment. Curr-azy.

I love straights. I prefer them so much to roll-ups, and I just plain cannot roll despite trying over one times. But I'm starting university in a few weeks and will be a poor, poor, poor student. So basically I have to learn to roll and accept the fact that I'm going to have to be not smoking straights. Sigh.

name: zathyr
text:
I do not smoke, but I think I might enjoy inhaling a burned-down peppermint factory.

Only time will tell.

name: buttermoths
text:
I always carry a lucky myself, and I've always been in the belief that the lucky cigarette is the one that doesn't give you cancer.
The jury is still out when it comes to deciding whether a lucky Lucky Strike actually CURES cancer, or if the two lucky's cancel each other out and gives you Super-Cancer.

name: mattylite
text: Recent studies have linked Super-Cancer to Incredible Death.

name: mrflunchy
text: This strip DOES go really well with Morrissey - 'There is a Place in Hell for Me and my Friends'

name: norsef
text: Morrissey  always goes down well with men crying. It's like a manly chick-flick.

name: st-elmos_fire
text:
Them: what's a lucky? shooting like that will kill fellows who are possums. And so on and so forth

You: following what Onstad says, and listening to Morrissey

There is definitely something to be said for that, that is dedication, that is also knowing Morrissey well enough to have Kill Uncle. Unless you are lame and just listened to it somewhere on the internet.

name: tonyhighwind
text: "You are cool, unless you are lame."

name: st-elmos_fire
text:
Damn, way to sum up what I said and make me think I totally said a wrong thing.

To update my opinion, even if you went and found "There is a place in hell for me and my friends" online and don't have kill uncle you are cool.

name: tonyhighwind
text: It's cool, dude, we all do shit like that.  For the record, I BT'd an album that had the song on it, but it was "My Time to Shine," not "Kill Uncle."  I still have not listened to it, yet.

name: ashoykh
text: that might be the most fun way to quit smoking.  i think i'll pick up smoking again so that I may quit in this manner.

name: ashoykh
text: append to title of this comic "tobacco"

name: heccibiggs
text: Ray smokes (smoked) Marlboro Lights? I have to say, I'm surprised.

name: odei
text: Ray has much respect for the Marlboro Man.

name: hellofditties
text: I don't know how to feel about this either.

name: saddestking
text: Ray is a classic man and can smoke a classic, popular cigarette such as Marlboro without worrying about whether it will make him look low.  He can drink beer without it being Stout Moose Butt Hyper-Porter, too.

name: killingthejay
text: maybe it's because he's quitting?

name: atticusonline
text: Why is the inside of his toilet black!?

name: fineoakstructure
text: I don't know, but Hungry Gus has the same issue. Perhaps they're one in the same?

name: cpnglxynchos
text: he should call Dr. Andretti.

name: st-elmos_fire
text:
Man, when he rags on Morrissey everyone loves it, when he suggests you listen to a song of his you kinda try and ignore it, like trying to ignore that one kid who says hes straight but is obviously as closeted as one of your mothers flowery dresses from when she was 16.

Damn

name: mangtastic
text: Morrissey is that One Kid

name: sex_bicycle
text: This strip tears me in half, such a cool way to quit smoking but NOOOOOOOO! What a waste of cigerettes :(

name: zem
text: can't spare an extra five bucks when you quit smoking?

name: sex_bicycle
text: it's still a waste that's like nearly %u20AC9 down the crapper literally, and also i am a bum. i have no money so no, i can't spare 9 euros to throw down the toilet.

name: sex_bicycle
text: ok that was meant to say 9 euros there where it spazs out.
